title: Bar Graph Builder
description: Interactive MicroSim where students construct bar graphs from categorical data by entering category names and frequencies. Supports vertical and horizontal orientations, frequency and relative frequency displays, and customizable bar colors.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Statistics
Data Visualization
Bar Graphs
Categorical Data
Frequency Distribution
learningObjective: Students will construct bar graphs from categorical data
prerequisites: Understanding of categorical vs. quantitative variables
Basic understanding of fractions and percentages

controls.label: Category Names
controls.description: Editable text fields for up to 6 category names

controls.label: Frequency Values
controls.description: Editable number fields for frequency values (0-100)
